participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and imaginative, often lost in their thoughts.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, eager to experience life independently.
participant_2.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents home. they are constantly on my back. i have a part time job at burger king. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything.
